NAME tea
DLG ITM_0

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG SPR_0
"""
Oh hello! Welcome to {clr2}the Milk and Mitten{clr2}.
{shuffle
  - What crazy weather weâ€™re having!
    It never snows here...
  - It's fantastic that we can stay open! Gas, not electric, you see.
  - Want anything to warm up? Coffee, tea, cocoa, pastries?
}
"""

DLG SPR_1
"""
{shuffle
  - Goin' underground. Way under. Only way to recharge after a busy year.
  - In spring I'm going to burst onto the scene with somethin' awesome!
  - Got some sweet jams I'm working on. Buzz.
}
"""

DLG SPR_2
"""
{shuffle
  - Snow and ice, bro? They're like the best things in life!
  - Try running fast, then along on your belly. That's snow-surfing!
  - Bro! Check out the fat flakes coming down out there!
}
"""

DLG SPR_3
"""
{shuffle
  - Hi hi! Want a sip of my tea? It's chamomile, very calming.
  - Hi hi! Try their seed cakes. Just the yummiest.
  - Hi hi! I like to snuggle up inside on days like this.
}
"""

DLG SPR_4
*brrrrrrr*

DLG SPR_5
*whoooooosh*

DLG SPR_6
*woooooooooo*

DLG SPR_7
*crunch*

DLG SPR_8
*crick*

DLG SPR_9
*crunch*

END 0
Warmed by friends and a good drink, you once again brave the wind and cold.

END 1


VAR a
42
